description: Template for managing everyday non-technical projects with structured planning, task management, and progress tracking

components.name: task-management
components.description: Core task tracking with difficulty scoring, dependencies, and hierarchical breakdown

components.name: project-brief
components.description: Structured template for defining project goals, budget, timeline, and constraints

components.name: budget-tracking
components.description: Financial planning and tracking with estimates, actuals, and variance analysis

components.name: decision-logging
components.description: Document decisions with options considered, criteria, and rationale

components.name: progress-documentation
components.description: Workflow for logging updates with photos, notes, and status changes

difficulty_scale.description: Difficulty based on technical complexity, financial risk, and need for professional help
difficulty_scale.1-2: Simple DIY tasks (paint a room, organize closet, minor shopping)
difficulty_scale.3-4: Moderate DIY tasks (install shelving, minor repairs, basic planning)
difficulty_scale.5-6: Complex DIY or simple contractor work (fence installation, appliance replacement, vendor coordination)
difficulty_scale.7-8: Major contractor work requiring breakdown (kitchen remodel, electrical panel upgrade, extensive planning)
difficulty_scale.9-10: Extensive multi-phase projects (home addition, full renovation, major life transitions)

integration_notes.task_management: Uses standard task-management component with custom difficulty scale for non-technical projects
integration_notes.gemini_api: Recommended for research tasks (material options, vendor comparisons, best practices) and image analysis (progress photos, design inspiration)
integration_notes.claude: Recommended for planning, task breakdown, budget calculations, and documentation
